item.title: [afr] Hired Hexblade

When Hired Hexblade enters the battlefield, if mana from a Treasure was spent to cast it, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

item.title: [afr] "Lurking Roper"
item.description:

"Lurking Roper" doesn't untap during your untap step.

Whenever you gain life, untap "Lurking Roper".

item.description:

Haste

Whenever Goblin Javelineer becomes blocked, it deals 1 damage to target creature blocking it.

item.title: [afr] Bag of Holding
item.description:
Artifact

Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard.

{2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

{4}, {T}, Sacrifice Bag of Holding: Return all cards exiled with Bag of Holding to their owner's hand.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1073767683

item.title: [afr] Power of Persuasion
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose target creature an opponent controls, then roll a d20.

1-9 | Return it to its owner's hand.

10-19 | Its owner puts it on the top of bottom of their library.

20 | Gain control of it until end of your next turn.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1073767683

item.description:

Ward {3} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {3}.)

item.title: [afr] Wizard's Spellbook
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Exile target instant or sorcery card from a graveyard. Roll a d20. Activate only as a sorcery.

1-9 | Copy that card. You may cast the copy.

10-19 | Copy that card. You may cast teh copy by paying {1} rather than paying its mana cost.

20 | Copy each card exiled with Wizard's Spellbook. You may cast any number of the copies without paying their mana costs.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1073767683

item.title: [afr] Demilich
item.description:
Creature — Skeleton Wizard

This spell costs {U} less to cast for each instant and sorcery you've cast this turn.

Whenever Demilich attacks, exile up to one target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. Copy it. You may cast the copy.

You may cast Demilich from your graveyard by exiling four instants and/or sorcery cards from your graveyard in addition to paying its other costs.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1073767683

item.title: [afr] Demilich
item.description:
Creature — Skeleton Wizard

This spell costs {U} less to cast for each instant and sorcery you've cast this turn.

Whenever Demilich attacks, exile up to one target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. Copy it. You may cast the copy.

You may cast Demilich from your graveyard by exiling four instants and/or sorcery cards from your graveyard in addition to paying its other costs.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1073767683

item.title: [afr] Fly
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature has flying and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, venture into the dungeon." (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)

https://it.ign.com/magic-the-gathering-arena/183952/news/magic-the-gathering-vi-sveliamo-in-anteprima-una-delle-carte-del-nuovo-set-avventure-nei-forgotten-r

item.title: [afr] Hunter's Mark
item.description:
Instant

This spell costs {3} less to cast if it targets a blue permanent you don't control.

This spell can't be countered.

Target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Then it deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker you don't control.

https://www.ign.com/articles/magic-gathering-dungeons-dragons-card-spoilers-find-the-path-hunters-mark

item.title: [afr] Find the Path
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant land

When Find the Path enters the battlefield, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)

Enchanted land has "{T}: Add {G}{G}."

https://www.ign.com/articles/magic-gathering-dungeons-dragons-card-spoilers-find-the-path-hunters-mark

item.title: [afr] Mordenkainen's Polymorph
item.description:
Instant

Until end of turn, target creature becomes a Dragon with base power and toughness 4/4 and gains flying. (It loses all other creature types.)

item.description:

item.title: [afr] Ray of Frost
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Flash

Enchant creature

When Ray of Frost enters the battlefield, if enchanted creature is red, tap it.

Enchanted creature loses all abilities as long as it is red.

Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

https://twitter.com/oh_joohyun/status/1410214169316495370

item.title: [afr] "Keen-Eared Sentry"
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

You have hexproof. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

Your opponents can't venture into the dungeon more than once each turn.

item.description:
Sorcery

Creature — Goblin Warlock

Flash

Tragic Backstory — Cast this spell only if a creature died this turn.

item.title: [afr] Shambling Ghast
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

When Shambling Ghast dies, choose one —

• Brave the Stench — Target creature an opponent controls -1/-1 until end of turn.

• Search the Body — Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

item.title: [afr] Meteor Swarm
item.description:
Sorcery

Meteor Swarm deals 8 damage divided as you choose among X target creatures and/or planeswalkers.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/adventures-in-the-forgotten-realms

item.title: [afr] You Come to the Gnoll Camp
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Intimidate Them — Up to two target creatures can't block this turn.

• Fend Them Off — Target creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn.

item.title: [afr] You Happen On a Glade
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Journey On — Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

• Make Camp — Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [afr] Gnoll Hunter
item.description:
Creature — Gnoll

Pact tactics — Whenever Gnoll Hunter attacks, if you attacked with creatures with total power 6 or greater this combat, put a +1/+1 counter on Gnoll Hunter.

item.title: [afr] Shessra, Death's Whisper
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Elf Warlock

Bewitching Whispers — When Shessra, Death's Whisper enters the battlefield, target creature blocks this turn if able.

Whispers of the Grave — At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, you may pay 2 life. If you do, draw a card.

item.title: [afr] You Find the Villains' Lair
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Foil Their Scheme — Counter target spell.

• Learn Their Secrets — Draw two cards, then discard two cards.

item.title: [afr] The Book of Vile Darkness
item.description:
Legendary Artifact

At the beginning of your end step, if you lost 2 or more life this turn, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

{T}, Exile The Book of Vile Darkness and artifacts you control named Eye of Vecna and Hand of Vecna: Create Vecna, a legendary 8/8 black Zombie God creature token with indestructible. It gains all triggered abilities of the exiled cards.

https://twitter.com/Xolo_Mariduena/status/1409930997739646979

Flash

Flying

Ebondeath, Dracolich enters the battlefield tapped.

You may cast Ebondeath, Dracolich from your graveyard if a creature not named Ebondeath, Dracolich died this turn.

item.title: [afr] Orb of Dragonkind
item.description:
Artifact

{1}, {T}: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to cast Dragon spells or to activate abilities of Dragons.

{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Orb of Dragonkind: Look at the top seven cards of your library. You may reveal a Dragon card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

https://twitter.com/DeborahAnnWoll/status/1409928113455128582

item.title: [afr] Flameskull
item.description:
Creature — Skeleton

Flying

Flameskull can't block.

Rejuvenation — When Flameskull dies, exile it. If you do, exile the top card of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play one of those cards. (If you cast Flameskull this way, you can't play the other card, and vice versa.)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y0jdOeipKgo

item.title: [afr] Werewolf Pack Leader
item.description:
Creature — Human Werewolf

Pack tactics — Whenever Werewolf Pack Leader attacks, if you attacked with creatures with total power 6 or greater this combat, draw a card.

{3}{G}: Until end of turn, Werewolf Pack Leader has base power and toughness 5/3, gains trample, and isn't a Human.

https://twitter.com/JoeManganiello/status/1409929983598882817
